channel.title: Dotnet on Küse's Codes
channel.description: Recent content in Dotnet on Küse's Codes

item.title: PDF converter in dotnet
item.description: There is once in a while the need to extract pure text from PDF files. This blog shows some attempts to do it with dot, and also with ruby.

item.title: Using local NuGet source / repository
item.description:
Had some problems creating a local nuget repository. This is how I succeeded:

Create a local nuget repository / source

$ cli nuget add source ~/.mynuget

This leads to these changes in the configuration file:

item.title: Bolero Hints
item.description:
This blog contains some experiences working with Bolero.

Bolero is a set of free and open-source libraries and tools to write web applications in F#. With it, you can write fully dynamic client-side web applications from the comfort of a strongly-typed functional language, all with great performance.

item.title: Machine Learning with ML.NET
item.description:

item.title: Websharper OSX
item.description:
Installing WebSharper

I’m developing web applications using WebSharper on macOS Monterey.

To install the the templates, use:

% dotnet new -i WebSharper.Templates

The following templates are installed:
